titles: The heresie and hatred which was falsly charged upon the innocent justly returned upon the guilty giving some brief and impartial account of the most material passages of a late dispute in writing that hath passed at Philadelphia betwixt John Delavall and George Keith : with some intermixt remarks and observations on the whole.
author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.
Delavall, John, d. 1693.
publisher: Printed and sold by William Bradford,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
